https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/psAt8iXYFnHnJBc2qLzmBmyQffK.jpg When relationship advice columnist Amalie Hess receives an unsigned love letter in a Christmas card, she returns to her hometown to solve the mystery of who sent it and maybe find true love. Christmas Love Letter
